thread.title: Lyft rolls out gas, car rental discounts for drivers
thread.title_full: Lyft rolls out gas, car rental discounts for drivers - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Carolyn Said
title: Lyft rolls out gas, car rental discounts for drivers
text:
Photo: Ted S. Warren / Ted S. Warren / Associated Press Katie Baranyuk gets out of a car driven by Dara Jenkins, a driver for the ride-sharing service Lyft, after getting a ride to downtown Seattle last year. Lyft on Thursday rolled out new perks for drivers. Katie Baranyuk gets out of a car driven by Dara Jenkins, a driver...
Trying to project a friendly image, Lyft assembled scores of drivers at its San Francisco headquarters on Thursday to announce new partnerships designed to make its drivers’ lives easier with cheaper gas, faster paychecks and flexible car rentals . Katie Baranyuk gets out of a car driven by Dara Jenkins, a driver for the ride-sharing service Lyft, after getting a ride to downtown Seattle last year. Lyft on Thursday rolled out new perks for drivers. Katie Baranyuk gets out of a car driven by Dara Jenkins, a driver...
